description: Pymol is one of the best softwares available to generate publication quality images related to chemistry.

One of the best molecular visualization tools - including comercial programs. PyMOL has a diverse set of commands, plus freat integration with Python. Almost anything that can be done in the GUI can be automated.

summary: The built-in plugin lighting settings cannot work

description: I have used Pymol extensively on windows and this version is way too underpowered. Granted I'm using it in a virtual machine so maybe thats the issue, but it is a virtual machine with more ppower than the windows laptop I used to use pymol with so I should be better off. I can load up smaller porteins but if I load something a bit bigger like pdb 3LZ0 it immeadately crashes. I will evaluate again on a bare metal fedora 39 installation, but right now, I'm less than impressed.
